tool.name: Centroid
tool.description: Computes the centroid of a polygon.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayInputPolygon False output_data_Result $output_data_Result name Centroid InputPolygon $InputPolygon prefer $prefer response $response outputType_Result $OutputSection_Result.outputType_Result transmissionMode_Result $OutputSection_Result.transmissionMode_Result

param.name: InputPolygon
param.label: Polygon to get the centroid
param.help: The centroid which is not necessarily within the geometry. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_Result
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_Result
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This service shall return the point that is the geometric centre of gravity of the geometry InputPolygon.
